abstract: "The Five," a talk show created to temporarily replace Glenn Beck's show on Fox News, will stay on the cable news network's schedule.
snippet: "The Five," a talk show created to temporarily replace Glenn Beck's show on Fox News, will stay on the cable news network's schedule.
lead_paragraph: "The Five," a talk show that was created to temporarily replace Glenn Beck's show on Fox News, is being made a more permanent part of the channel's weekday schedule.

headline.main: Fox News Decides to Keep 'The Five'
